name: K.K. Spacee
description: Provider of renting services intended to allow idle spaces to be rented out to general users as a meeting room. The company's platform offers a wide variety of rooms, from cheap to high-grade, such as private rental conference rooms, training, study sessions, seminar venues, rental kitchens, photography studios, and party rental rooms, enabling clients to book open meeting rooms in nearby offices.
